description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover pan, remove from heat and let sit for 5 minutes before serving. Spoon into serving bowls and top with remaining prawns.
